remarks: The norm of a normed complex vector space is nonnegative.  Second part of Problem 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 64.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvge0.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvge0.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvge0 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> 0 <_ ( N ` A ) ) $.
